presentationColumns.name: Change in # of Active Subscriptions
presentationColumns.description: The change in the Number of Subscriptions in a given period. This metric is calculated as follows: Number of active subscriptions (Period End) - Number of active  subscriptions (Period Start)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Change in # of Active Subscriptions

presentationColumns.name: Change in # of Active Customers
presentationColumns.description:
The change in the number of Active Customers in a given period. This metric is calculated as follows: 
# of Active Customers (Period End) - # of Active Customers (Period start)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Change in # of Active Customers

presentationColumns.name: Change in Product Net Price

presentationColumns.name: Change in Active MRR

presentationColumns.name: Change in Average Revenue per Customer
presentationColumns.description:
The change in Average Revenue per Customer in a given Period. This metric is calculated as follows:
Average Revenue per customer (Period End) - Average Revenue per customer (Period Start)

presentationColumns.name: Change in # of Active Customers % (MoM)
presentationColumns.description:
The % change in Active Customer in a given period (Month). This metric is calculated as follows:
100* [# of Active Customer (Period End) - # of Active Customer (Period start)]/# of Active Customer (Period start)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Change in # of Active Customers %

presentationColumns.name: Change in # of Active Customers % (QoQ)
presentationColumns.description:

tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscription Historical Trend.Change in # of Active Customers %

presentationColumns.name: Change in # of Active Customers % (YoY)
presentationColumns.description:

tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Historical Trend
